rules.name: Behind Enemy Lines
rules.description: Your orders are clear: break through the enemy and cut off their escape routes.

thresholds.condition: One unit (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked) wholly within opponent deployment zone
Two or more units (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked) wholly within opponent deployment zone

rules.drawCondition: If it is the first battle round, you can draw a new Secondary Mission card

rules.name: Storm Hostile Objective
rules.description: You must dominate the field of battle. Storm every site of tactical import and leave the foe with no place to hide.

thresholds.condition: Control one or more objectives controlled by opponent at start of turn
Round 2+: Opponent controlled no objectives at start, you control one+ you did not control

rules.drawCondition: If it is the first battle round, you can draw a new Secondary Mission card

rules.name: Engage on All Fronts
rules.description: This area is of extreme importance. You are to lead an immediate all-out assault to capture it and deny it to our enemy for good.

thresholds.condition: Presence in two table quarters
Presence in three table quarters
Presence in four table quarters

rules.name: Establish Locus
rules.description: You must guide allied forces onto the battlefield by any means necessary; this objective must be completed swiftly to pave the road to victory.

thresholds.condition: Unit established locus within 6" of battlefield center
Unit established locus within opponent deployment zone

rules.name: Cleanse
rules.description: Your forces have identified a series of tainted objectives in this area; these locations must be purified.

thresholds.condition: One objective cleansed (Fixed)
One objective cleansed (Tactical)
Two or more objectives cleansed (Fixed)
Two or more objectives cleansed (Tactical)

rules.name: Assassination
rules.description: The enemy looks to their champions for courage. You must identify and eliminate such targets with extreme prejudice.

thresholds.condition: CHARACTER with 4+ wounds destroyed (Fixed)
CHARACTER with <4 wounds destroyed (Fixed)
One or more CHARACTERs destroyed this turn (Tactical)
All enemy CHARACTERs destroyed (Tactical)

rules.scoringTrigger: While card is active (Fixed) / End of either player's turn (Tactical)

rules.name: No Prisoners
rules.description: Show no mercy. Exterminate your enemies.

rules.name: Cull the Horde
rules.description: The enemy come forth in teeming masses. Their ranks must be thinned if the day is to be won.

thresholds.condition: INFANTRY unit with 13+ Starting Strength destroyed (Fixed)
One or more INFANTRY units with 13+ Starting Strength destroyed this turn (Tactical)

rules.scoringTrigger: While card is active (Fixed) / End of either player's turn (Tactical)
rules.drawCondition: If no enemy units satisfy condition, can discard and redraw

rules.name: Bring It Down
rules.description: The opposing army contains numerous heavily armoured units. You must prioritise their destruction.

thresholds.condition: MONSTER or VEHICLE destroyed (Fixed)
+ 15+ total wounds at Starting Strength (Fixed, cumulative)
+ 20+ total wounds at Starting Strength (Fixed, cumulative)
One or more MONSTER or VEHICLE destroyed this turn (Tactical)

rules.scoringTrigger: While card is active (Fixed) / End of either player's turn (Tactical)
rules.drawCondition: If no enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE units, can discard and redraw

rules.name: Defend Stronghold
rules.description: You are charged with the defence of a critical objective. It must not be permitted to fall into enemy hands.

thresholds.condition: Control one or more objectives in your deployment zone

rules.scoringTrigger: End of opponent's turn or end of battle (round 2+)
rules.drawCondition: If first battle round, draw new card

rules.name: Marked for Death
rules.description: You have been ordered to eliminate specific enemy assets to ensure victory, no matter how insignificant they may seem.

thresholds.condition: One or more Alpha Target units destroyed or removed
No Alpha Targets destroyed, but Gamma Target destroyed or removed

rules.drawCondition: If no enemy units on battlefield, discard and redraw. Opponent selects 3 Alpha Targets, you select 1 Gamma Target.

rules.name: Secure No Man's Land
rules.description: You must advance swiftly into no man's land and seize it before the enemy can, lest they take control of the entire battlefield.

thresholds.condition: Control one objective in No Man's Land
Control two or more objectives in No Man's Land

rules.name: Sabotage
rules.description: This region is replete with strategic assets or supply caches vital to your foe. See to it that they are reduced to just so much flaming wreckage.

thresholds.condition: Unit committed sabotage outside opponent deployment
Unit committed sabotage in opponent deployment

rules.scoringTrigger: End of opponent's turn or end of battle

rules.name: Area Denial
rules.description: It is critical that this area is dominated. No enemy vanguard or guerrilla units can be allowed to disrupt your plans.

thresholds.condition: Your units within 3" of center, no enemy within 3" of center
Your units within 3" of center, no enemy within 6" of center

rules.name: Recover Assets
rules.description: You must locate and reclaim scattered strategic assets.

thresholds.condition: Two units recovered assets
Three or more units recovered assets

rules.scoringTrigger: End of your turn or end of battle
rules.drawCondition: If Incursion mission or fewer than 3 units, can discard and redraw

rules.name: A Tempting Target
rules.description: An opportunity to seize a valuable asset has been identified, but the enemy are likely to use it as bait in a trap. Move to secure the site, but be wary of enemy ambushes.

thresholds.condition: Control Tempting Target objective marker

rules.drawCondition: Opponent selects one objective in No Man's Land as Tempting Target

rules.name: Extend Battle Lines
rules.description: The battleground is conquered one yard at a time. Lead your forces forward and establish a strong presence in the area.

thresholds.condition: Control objectives in deployment + No Man's Land
Control objectives in No Man's Land only

rules.name: Overwhelming Force
rules.description: You must scour the enemy from the face of the battlefield.

rules.name: Display of Might
rules.description: Intimidation is the most potent of weapons. Degrade the combat abilities of your opponent to demonstrate your superiority and erode enemy morale.

thresholds.condition: More of your units than opponent's wholly within No Man's Land

rules.drawCondition: If first battle round, draw new card
